      • compile

        public static MockerJavaClassFile compile(MockerJavaSourceFile sourceFile)
        Compiles the source code provided in sourceFile. Any compilation error will by printed to System.err.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The MockerJavaSourceFile to compile
        Returns:
        the MockerJavaClassFile containing the compiled java byte code
